title: Pick any quotes and then add "in my ass"
body:
{{champion:6}} : Eternal life, endless torture in my ass. (Aww yiss)

{{champion:14}} : COME OUT & DIE IN MY ASS!!!

{{champion:122}} : Witness true strength in my ass.

{{champion:22}} : I only need one shot......in my ass.

{{champion:154}} : I should get a suit in my ass :3

Garen, I think you might be the one in my ass.
